snippet: As part of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, the new levies, which take effect in January, include an increase in the payroll tax on wages and a tax on investment income.
abstract: Taxes adopted as part of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act take effect in January, and include an increase in payroll tax on wages and a tax on investment income.
lead_paragraph: As part of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, the new levies, which take effect in January, include an increase in the payroll tax on wages and a tax on investment income.

headline.main: New Taxes to Take Effect to Fund Health Care Law
headline.print_headline: New Taxes to Take Effect to Fund Health Care Law
